partnerDetails.about:
Since 1993, Automotion has supported machine builders and system integrators in the design of machine control and motion control . As an experienced specialist, we propose an efficient solution based on the right components. We build useful software around it. Or we assist you when you want to do that yourself.

You choose how and when you switch on Automotion. With the top knowledge of motion control and automation that we have in-house, we are an added value in every phase of the machine design.


Automotion is Preferred Partner of quality brand Schneider Electric. Unlike the normal customer, we therefore have direct access to their support teams.

You thus benefit from the stability, innovation and worldwide availability of a large company such as Schneider Electric. At the same time you enjoy the fast and accurate service of the small Automotion team!
